infos.value: Haaa...
I'm beginning to think Machérie isn't even in this castle anymore.
I'm so bored walking around these halls, I'm getting sleepy...
Oh, sounds like you've finally begun to appreciate my art.
But...you're not quite there yet.
You've got to give your mind to the Sandman before you even start to feel sleepy.
Otherwise, you'll never reach the rank of master.
Watch closely. This is how it's done.
Zzzzzz...
...Truly, I am humbled in your presence...
Anyway, back to things that actually matter... How much farther is it to Queen Helena's chambers?
We're almost there, probably.
"Probably"...? Didn't you just say we were almost there half an hour ago?
...You certainly like squabbling over the details, don't you?
Wh-what? You think I'm going to fall for—
Wahhh! Wh-wh-who's this supposed to be!?
Lord Sterne...
...You know him or something?
It's Lord Sterne. He's the second prince of Leonis.
Elsirelle... You were still asleep?
Um... W-well, I...
Well then, let me make one thing plain to you. I belong to Leonis no longer.
Wh-what...!?
Who is this oaf?
The name's Camillo. I used to belong to Rundall... Well, originally I was from Heindler.
Anyway, I'm here to rescue Machérie. And you'd best not be thinking of getting in my way.
Oh, but I am.
Uh, h-hold on...
